name: Curse of the Hero
description:
A tale of a knight who wanted to save his people from the lies. Only to be cursed to turn into a demon by his opposition. He might be a hero.. but the people sees him as the villain. Are you really a hero if you aren't considered one by the people? Or is it upto the truth in the person's heart, that makes him a hero?

Experience a tale of a hero who society turned its back on and made a villain. An action-packed emotional story telling game with just the right feel to play.

In this 2D side-scrolling beat 'em up, you are not the hero -or are you? Go through 11 different levels of varying emotions and adventures, beat your Archenemy, and redeem your name; in the final showdown.

---------------------------------------

This is my entry for the Godot Game Jam #33, and I hope anyone who plays this gets an unforgettable experience. If you did, do drop a review, it would make my day!
